plot: The seven year old Arthur is afraid of the dark. He doesn't dare to cross the hallway to go to the toilet at night. Inspired by his grandma, he starts weeing in the hallway, with consequences that he could not possibly foresee.
title: Ich bin nicht mutig
plot_es: The seven year old Arthur is afraid of the dark. He doesn't dare to cross the hallway to go to the toilet at night. Inspired by his grandma, he starts weeing in the hallway, with consequences that he could not possibly foresee.
plot_en: The seven year old Arthur is afraid of the dark. He doesn't dare to cross the hallway to go to the toilet at night. Inspired by his grandma, he starts weeing in the hallway, with consequences that he could not possibly foresee.
